ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ يَٰٓأَبَانَا ٱسْتَغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا خَٰطِـِٔينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'Our father, may we be forgiven for all the many wrongs that we have done. We were indeed greatly mistaken men.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Said (the sons): "O our father, pray for us that our sins be forgiven, for we are really sinners."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They said: "Father! Pray for the forgiveness of our sins; we were truly guilty."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They said, "Father, ask God to forgive our sins; we have certainly sinned".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “O our father! Seek forgiveness for our sins, for we were indeed guilty.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "O our father! Ask forgiveness (from Allah) for our sins, indeed we have been sinners."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: O our father! ask forgiveness of our faults for us, surely we were sinners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'Our father, ask forgiveness of our crimes for us; for certainly we have been sinful.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: O our father! Ask forgiveness of our sins for us, for lo! we were sinful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They said, "O our father! Ask forgiveness for our sins -- we were truly in the wrong."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: our father! pray for forgiveness of our sins for us; verily we have been sinners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘Father! Plead [with Allah] for forgiveness of our sins! We have indeed been erring.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "O our father! ask for us forgiveness for our sins, for we were truly at fault."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "O our father! Ask forgiveness (from Allah) for our sins, indeed we have been sinners."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: His sons said: 'Father, ask forgiveness for our sins. We have indeed been sinners'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “Father, pray for the forgiveness of our sins; we were indeed at fault.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "O our father, ask for us forgiveness of our sins; indeed, we have been sinners."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [12:97] They said, ‘O our father, ask forgiveness for us of our sins; truly we have been sinful’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said) his children and grandchildren said: (0 our father! Ask forgiveness of our sins for us) ask Allah to forgive our sins, (for lo! we were sinful) we were wrong-doers and disobedient towards Allah.
